backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend that manages global master templates, document contents, user profiles, and access control using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features (Save button, Apply Header to All, and post-download Share flow) to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key details of each component, hook, utility, and configuration file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including sidebar, chart, and destructive color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app titled 'Loan Document Generator' that mounts the React root and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages form state, template designer dialog, PDF generation/download flow, and triggers the Web Share API via `sharePdf` after a successful download.
frontend/src/components/FormSection.tsx: Form component handling loan applicant fields, custom fields, EMI auto-calculation, and per-document-type Download and Share buttons that generate a PDF then invoke the Web Share API.
frontend/src/components/preview/Template: Renders absolute-positioned overlay elements (background image, watermark text, seal, and signature) on top of a document preview using template settings.
frontend/src/components/PreviewDialog.ts: A modal dialog that renders a document preview using template data, displaying a two-column header (business name/address + logo), rendered body content, and optional signature/seal rows.
frontend/src/components/TemplateDesigner: A multi-tab UI component for designing and managing both built-in and custom document templates, supporting editing of header, watermark, background, signature, and seal settings with save/preview/delete actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, and identity persistence with status tracking.
A generic React hook that synchronizes a state value with localStorage, initializing from stored data and persisting updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: A placeholder/stub file indicating all functionality is client-side only with no backend queries defined.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: A hook managing state and persistence for built-in and custom document templates, providing CRUD operations and a bulk header-apply function backed by localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that configures Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines a warm orange/amber CSS custom property color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: A utility function that triggers a browser file download for a Blob, converting .pdf extensions to .png in the filename.
frontend/src/lib/loan/calculateEmi.ts: Exports a function to calculate monthly EMI using the standard formula and a currency formatter for Indian Rupees.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generatePdf.ts: Generates a PNG blob from a document template and form data by rendering to a canvas element.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/layout.ts: Defines A4 page dimensions, margins, header/footer heights, and content area constants for PDF rendering at 96 DPI.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/renderDocumentToCan: Renders a full document (background, watermark, header, body, signature/stamp, footer) onto an HTML canvas using template and form data.
frontend/src/lib/qr/qrPayload.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for QR code payload generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/qr/renderQr.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for QR code rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/shareUtils.ts: Provides a utility to share a PDF blob via the Web Share API, returning false if sharing is unsupported or fails.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/fileToDa: Converts an image File object to a base64 data URL using FileReader.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/position: Maps position preset strings to CSS style objects and canvas pixel coordinates for placing elements like logos or stamps.
frontend/src/lib/templates/getTemplate.t: Returns a normalized Template object for a given document type, checking localStorage for custom templates before falling back to built-in defaults.
frontend/src/lib/templates/renderTemplat: Replaces mustache-style placeholders in a template's headline and body with values from form data, including custom fields.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates loan form data fields (name, mobile, address, PAN, loan amount, interest rate, year) and returns an array of error messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/form.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for FormData and CustomField, and the DocumentType union type for the three supported loan letter types.
frontend/src/types/templates.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Template, CustomTemplate, and related settings types (background, watermark, image elements, position presets).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters from query strings, hash-based routes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Loan Document Generator project, including three existing features (Save button, Apply Header to All Templates, Share after download) and their corresponding pending action requests.
